title: Western | The Fear Merchants (1960) | Michael Landon, Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts | Bonanza

sources.title: Western | The Fear Merchants (1960) | Michael Landon, Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts | Bonanza
sources.description:
The Cartwrights come to the aid of a Chinese-American stable hand accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate who wants all "foreigners" to leave Virginia City. Philip Ahn and Helen Westcott guest star.
 
#20 Bonanza: The Fear Merchants
Director: Lewis Allen
Writers: Frank Unger, Frank Unger 
Stars: Michael Landon, Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts 
Genres: Bonanza, Classics, Cult, TV, Western
